name: The Running Heretic
description:
You are a heretic who discovered a magic light and now you need to run from the inquisition. 

How to play: 

WASD for movement. Find the hatch to escape. The closer you are to the exit, the more frequent is the pulsation of the magic light. The closer the inquisition to you, the more intense the music gets.

Music and sound effects by Isonzo  https://isonzo.itch.io

Coding, art and sound effects by Nikofon.

Font: https://www.dafont.com/f-zero-gba-text-1.font

Footsteps: https://freesound.org/people/Yoyodaman234/sounds/166509/

Made for Spooky 2D jam 2020, #S2DJ2020
